Tabs

Remembering State

The state (open or closed) of the tabs can optionally be remembered. i.e. Pressing the back button will open the page with the tab open that was clicked last.
Add attribute data-remember-state="true"

This is a screenreader header for tabs

  • ThirdThirdThird
  • FourthFourth
  • FifthFifthFifthFifth
  • Sixth
  • Seventh
    • ...
